result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Kenneth W. Lowe in court with attorney Michael Lim.  Margaret J. Struve appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 23, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Kenneth W. Lowe in court with attorney Michael Lim.  Margaret J. Struve appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  New charges pending.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Warrant not issued. Attorney Lim made contact with defendant.  Warrant not issued.
Attorney Michael Lim in court.  Margaret J. Struve appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant fails to appear.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 28, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Defendant Kenneth W. Lowe in court with attorney Michael Lim.  Christian A. Gossett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bond continues.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defense moves for signature bond - court grants with bond condition modifications.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
